title: What The ...
body:
ummm...what
got onto league today and the client looked like this

replies.body: i just relogged and now there is a blank loading screen. help plz
Likely client corruption, repair your client. If that doesn't work, try a reinstall.

Reinstall
The worst news a player could be given
Even though it's the best solution, it's soooooooooooooooooooo (times by 3x10^93) long
I wish mine looked like that (image and IP)
Ah, the nostalgia from the old client...
some times happens, its when your internet is having trouble getting a proper connection
